mediaFiles.imagePrompt: Using the provided image, place the provided user interface screenshot on a gradient background. Ensure that the features of the user interface screenshot remain completely unchanged. The added background should be generated using random gradient colors inspired by these color pairs (#EBEFFD, #F9F8FF) and (#FCEFF0, #FEFBF1). Make sure that the longer side of the user screenshot is no more than 24px away from the edge of the background.
